LanguageData.UnfinishedCGearCtrlChip.label: Unfinished TC Chip
LanguageData.CGearCtrlChip.label: TC Control Chip
LanguageData.CGearCtrlChip.description: A control chip used in Tactical Charged (TC) Gear.
LanguageData.CGearSlot_Melee_Power.label: TC Power Slot
LanguageData.CGearSlot_Melee_Power.description: An enhancement slot for a TC power chip.
LanguageData.CGearSlot_Gun_Aim.label: TC Aim Slot
LanguageData.CGearSlot_Gun_Aim.description: An enhancement slot for a TC aim chip.
LanguageData.CGearSlot_Gun_Boost.label: TC Boost Slot
LanguageData.CGearSlot_Gun_Boost.description: An enhancement slot for a TC boost chip.
LanguageData.CGearPowerChip.label: TC Power Chip
LanguageData.CGearPowerChip.description: A power enhancement chip used in Tactical Charged (TC) Gear.
LanguageData.CGearDodgeChip.label: TC Dodge Chip
LanguageData.CGearDodgeChip.description: A power enhancement chip used in Tactical Charged (TC) Gear. This empowers the dodge skill of the wielder.
LanguageData.CGearAimChip.label: TC Aim Chip
LanguageData.CGearAimChip.description: An aiming enhancement chip used in Tactical Charged (TC) Gear.
LanguageData.CGearReflexChip.label: TC Reflex Chip
LanguageData.CGearReflexChip.description: An aiming enhancement chip used in Tactical Charged (TC) Gear. This chip empowers a more shorter range use, at the expense of longer ranges.
LanguageData.CGearHunterChip.label: TC Hunter Chip
LanguageData.CGearHunterChip.description: An aiming enhancement chip used in Tactical Charged (TC) Gear. This chip empowers long range use, at the expense of shorter ranges .
LanguageData.CGearBoostChip.label: TC Boost Chip
LanguageData.CGearBoostChip.description: A boost enhancement chip used in Tactical Charged (TC) Gear.
LanguageData.CGearHeatSinkChip.label: TC Heat Sink Chip
LanguageData.CGearHeatSinkChip.description: A boost enhancement chip used in Tactical Charged (TC) Gear. This chip control heat dispersement well.
